div.div: GO TAKE A NAP OR SOMETHING

div.a: Here's What Time The Election Will Be Called

div.div: Everybody knows that tonight’s magic number is 270—as in, the number of electoral votes needed to win the White House. What nobody knows is exactly what time the winning candidate will reach 270.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UhKbEB&via=Digg&text=Here's What Time The Election Will Be Called

div.div: WHO KNOWS WHEN WE'LL GET TO SLEEP
Americans went to the polls on Tuesday and reporters around the country will be providing live updates, analysis and results throughout the day.

div.a: New Photos Reveal Ashton Kutcher As Older Steve Jobs

div.div: We'd put the title of the movie in the headline, but we think it's really, really stupid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/MPhfj0&via=Digg&text=New Photos Reveal Ashton Kutcher As Older Steve Jobs

div.div: SCRUB OFF ALL THE HAIR GEL
After Election Day, the work of tearing down a presidential campaign begins. Field offices are dismantled. Bunting and balloons are junked. And a small company in Michigan gets back its airplane.
Thanks to the 3D-printing wizards at Shapeways, there may be more bacon to go around. That's because they've created a Mobius strip of bacon that goes on and on and on...to the break of dawn.
Racist political cartoons are as American as apple pie.

div.a: New 'Sauron' Dinosaur Found, Was Big As T. Rex

div.div: Named after the demonic Eye of Sauron from the Lord of the Rings films, a new species of flesh-ripping dinosaur terrorized North Africa some 95 million years ago, a new study says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RH7JOD&via=Digg&text=New 'Sauron' Dinosaur Found, Was Big As T. Rex

div.div: In the same way that LinkedIn has become the home of your professional identity, and Facebook the home of your social identity, founder and CEO Adam Lieb wants to turn his startup Duxter into the center of your gaming identity.

div.a: Watch A Machine Turn A Vote For Obama Into A Vote For Romney

div.div: A Pennsylvania electronic voting machine has been taken out of service after being captured on video changing a vote for President Obama into one for Mitt Romney.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SxYCio&via=Digg&text=Watch A Machine Turn A Vote For Obama Into A Vote For Romney

div.div: FEAR & LOATHING ON THE CAMPAIGN TRAIL

div.a: I Took LSD And Went To See Romney

div.div: Jamie Davis is clearly a fan of Hunter S. Thompson. Just to be clear, we believe taking LSD and going to a Mitt Romney rally is incredibly irresponsible. He should have gone to an Animal Collective show. But what’s done is done.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TGCTIg&via=Digg&text=I Took LSD And Went To See Romney

div.a: Porn King Explains Why Condoms Shouldn't Be Mandatory

div.div: Measure B would make condoms in porn mandatory in Los Angeles County — porn potentate John Stagliano argues against it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TuWb0M&via=Digg&text=Porn King Explains Why Condoms Shouldn't Be Mandatory

div.div: BECAUSE NOT EVERYONE LIVES IN AMERICA

div.a: Replace All Your Annoying Political News With Cats

div.div: A Chrome extension that removes politics from your FB and Twitter feeds permanently––by replacing the BS with awesome stuff.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TgknGu&via=Digg&text=Replace All Your Annoying Political News With Cats

div.div: One PR company—and its tracking program—creep out an Ars writer.

div.a: The Lady Who Drove Around A Schoolbus On The Sidewalk Ordered To Wear An 'Idiot' Sign

div.div: Justice has been served to the Cleveland woman caught on video by a schoolbus driver as she drove on the sidewalk to get around the bus as children were climbing aboard.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YSo4TP&via=Digg&text=The Lady Who Drove Around A Schoolbus On The Sidewalk Ordered To Wear An 'Idiot' Sign

div.a: Putting The Most Expensive Election Of All-Time In Context

div.div: The GDP of Nicaragua: $6.4 billion; the cost of the US presidential election to the two candidates: $6 billion, or $20 in petty cash per every US man, woman and child.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UvdePw&via=Digg&text=Putting The Most Expensive Election Of All-Time In Context

div.a: Ninety-Two Years Of Women Voting In Pictures

div.div: In bustle skirts, hoop skirts, and power suits, they pulled levers, checked boxes, and touched screens. As you cast your ballot today, enjoy a gallery of archival images of American women voting, from 1920 — the year after the Nineteenth Amendment passed — to now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wvzqjd&via=Digg&text=Ninety-Two Years Of Women Voting In Pictures

div.a: Voter Appears To Die, Then Asks, 'Did I Vote?'

div.div: Sometimes dead men really do get to vote.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YE9gJp&via=Digg&text=Voter Appears To Die, Then Asks, 'Did I Vote?'

div.div: Chirp lets you send secret messages encoded in sound -- like QR codes, but, you know, actually kind of cool.
THINGS THAT WOULD DESTROY THE INTERNET
Yes, those hard-hitting questions keep coming for the candidates, even on Election Day: President Barack Obama was asked by one interviewer Tuesday about the "Gangnam Style" dance craze.
